channel.title: [718/742] EPSILON Release 99% UPTIME VPS - ALL SKILLS - Eco & Stable exp
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ot1no4l.png[/img]
Our plans: To gain more players! To add more content! To satisfy our players! And to have fun!
[URL=http://epsilonrsps.webs.com/][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/BILDER/7YIOxgN.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Epsilonv1.jar][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Forums/cMx9Mn1.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://epsilonrsps.webs.com/webclient][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Forums/g3gfTLf.png[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/3008220595.png[/img] Hosting 24/7 Server: Epsilon server runs off a Windows box VPS(Not linux for other reasons. I'm very good with SSH). 3g Memory, Duel(No more power is needed, I've already done tests and a few benchmarks and Epsilon could easily handle 1,000 players if it got to that point). Site: The site runs off a CentOS Linux box VPS. We also use another Linux box for DDoS tunneling. I don't think site statistics matter, but so you know the site wont go down.
Active Community and friendly staff. Info: An active community is a big concern for Epsilon. With strive to keep the community active not only in-game but also on the forums. All our staff is individually selected and all have a professional outlook on the future of Epsilon.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/4rubyf.png[/img]
Does not loose item in death! / You do if you enter wilderness! Switching Summoning Chaotics Overloads Combat Classes Player Titles Slayer (Good for making money) Economic Server Daily Updates Fight Pits FULL Fight Kiln FULL All teleports in one NPC & Quest tab!! Great PvP and PvM combat Pest Control God Wars Dungeon / Instant tele to the boss your desire! Barrows FULL Tormented Demons QBD (Queen black dragon) Corporal Beast Frost Dragons Curses & Normal prayers. (Quick Prayers as well) All spell books (Modern, Ancients, Lunar) (Character Customization) (Gender,Hair,Clothes) Player following Player & Shop Trading Dicing All skills trainable!! VPS 4GB - 24/7 / 99% uptime! Flawless farming! Squeal Of Fortune!
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2njm4pl.png[/img]
[IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Bilder1/home.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Bilder1/Shops.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Bilder1/glacor.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/18:00 20.12.201318:00 20.12.2013u/22686869/Bilder1/dark%20beast.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Bilder1/fun%20with%20bandos.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Bilder1/Queenblackdragon.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Bilder1/Dominion%20towers.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Bilder1/Agility.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Bilder1/nex.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Bilder1/try%20it.png[/img]

@boogey_wwe wrote:

[CENTER]

Our plans:
To gain more players!

[URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/22686869/Epsilonv1.jar][/URL]

[URL=http://epsilonrsps.webs.com/webclient][/URL]


Hosting 24/7
Server:
Epsilon server runs off a Windows box VPS(Not linux for other reasons. I’m very good with SSH). 3g Memory, Duel(No more power is needed, I’ve already done tests and a few benchmarks and Epsilon could easily handle 1,000 players if it got to that point).
Site:
The site runs off a CentOS Linux box VPS. We also use another Linux box for DDoS tunneling. I don’t think site statistics matter, but so you know the site wont go down.

Active Community and friendly staff.
Info:
An active community is a big concern for Epsilon. With strive to keep the community active not only in-game but also on
the forums. All our staff is individually selected and all have a professional outlook on the future of Epsilon.
